feedback.directory.header.name: Name
feedback.pin.add-pin-to-protect: Add a pin to protect snapshot from deletion
feedback.policy.command-mode-help: Essential (must succeed; default behavior), optional (failures are tolerated), or async (Kopia will start the action but not wait for it to finish)
feedback.policy.compression.compression-: Specify compression algorithm to use when snapshotting files in this directory and subdirectories
feedback.policy.compression.maximal-file: Files whose size exceeds the provided value will not be compressed
feedback.policy.compression.minimal-file: Files that are smaller than the provided value will not be compressed
feedback.policy.compression.never-compre: Never compress the following file extensions (one extension per line)
feedback.policy.compression.only-compres: Only compress files with the following file extensions (one extension per line)
feedback.policy.confirm-delete-policy: Are you sure you want to delete this policy?
feedback.policy.error-handling.ignore-di: Treat directory read errors as non-fatal.
feedback.policy.error-handling.ignore-fi: Treat file read errors as non-fatal.
feedback.policy.error-handling.ignore-un: Treat unrecognized/unsupported directory entries as non-fatal errors.
feedback.policy.files.ignore-files-help:
List of file and directory names to ignore.
See documentation on ignoring files.
feedback.policy.files.ignore-rule-files-: Ignore Rule Files From Parent Directories
When set, the files specifying ignore rules (.kopiaignore, etc.) from the parent directory are ignored
List of additional files containing ignore rules (each file configures ignore rules for the directory and its subdirectories)
feedback.policy.files.ignore-rules-from-: When set, ignore rules from the parent directory are ignored
feedback.policy.files.ignore-well-known-: Ignore directories containing CACHEDIR.TAG and similar
feedback.policy.files.scan-only-one-file: Do not cross filesystem boundaries when creating a snapshot
feedback.policy.find-hint: Enter directory to find or set policy
feedback.policy.find-none-create: No policy found for directory {{path}}. Please setup a new policy.
feedback.policy.logging.cache-hit-help: Log verbosity when a cache is used instead of uploading the file
feedback.policy.logging.cache-miss-help: Log verbosity when a cache cannot be used and a file must be hashed
feedback.policy.logging.directory-ignore: Log verbosity when a directory is ignored
feedback.policy.logging.directory-snapsh: Log verbosity when a directory is snapshotted
feedback.policy.logging.file-ignored-hel: Log verbosity when a file, symbolic link, etc. is ignored
feedback.policy.logging.file-snapshotted: Log verbosity when a file, symbolic link, etc. is snapshotted
feedback.policy.other.disable-parent-pol: Prevents any parent policies from affecting this directory and its subdirectories
feedback.policy.other.json-representatio: This is the internal representation of a policy
feedback.policy.policies-defined-by-path: Policies can only be defined for absolute paths.
feedback.policy.retention.annual-snapsho: How many annual snapshots to retain per source. The latest snapshot from each calendar year will be retained
feedback.policy.retention.daily-snapshot: How many daily snapshots to retain per source. The latest snapshot from each day will be retained
feedback.policy.retention.hourly-snapsho: How many hourly snapshots to retain per source. The latest snapshot from each hour will be retained
feedback.policy.retention.ignore-identic: Do NOT save a snapshot when no files have been changed
feedback.policy.retention.latest-snapsho: Number of the most recent snapshots to retain per source
feedback.policy.retention.monthly-snapsh: How many monthly snapshots to retain per source. The latest snapshot from each calendar month will be retained
feedback.policy.retention.weekly-snapsho: How many weekly snapshots to retain per source. The latest snapshot from each week will be retained
feedback.policy.scheduling.cron-help:
Snapshot schedules using UNIX crontab syntax (one per line):
See supported format details.
feedback.policy.scheduling.manual-snapsh: Only create snapshots manually (disables scheduled snapshots)
feedback.policy.scheduling.missed-snapsh: Immediately run any missed snapshots when kopia starts (only relevant for Time-of-day snapshots)
feedback.policy.scheduling.snapshot-freq: How frequently to create snapshots in KopiaUI or Kopia server (has no effect outside of the server mode)
feedback.policy.scheduling.times-of-day-: Create snapshots at the specified times of day (24hr format)
feedback.policy.scheduling.upcoming-snap: Times of upcoming snapshots calculated based on policy parameters
feedback.policy.timeout-help: Timeout in seconds before Kopia kills the process
feedback.policy.upload.maximum-parallel-: Maximum number of files that will be read in parallel (defaults to the number of logical processors)
max number of parallel file reads
Maximum number of snapshots that can be uploaded simultaneously
must be specified using global, user, or host policy

feedback.provider.gcs.enter-object-name-: Enter object name prefix or leave empty
feedback.provider.repositoryserver.enter: Enter trusted server certificate fingerprint printed at server startup
feedback.provider.required-either-key-fi: One of Password, Key File or Key Data is required.
feedback.provider.required-either-known-: Either Known Hosts File or Known Hosts Data is required, but not both.
feedback.provider.s3.enter-object-name-p: Enter object name prefix or leave empty
feedback.provider.s3.override-region-hin: Enter specific region (e.g., us-west-1) or leave empty
feedback.provider.s3.session-token-hint: Enter session token or leave empty

feedback.provider.sftp.enter-ssh-argumen: Enter SSH command arguments ('user@host -s sftp' will be appended automatically)
feedback.provider.sftp.launch-external-s: By default Kopia connects to the server using internal SSH client which supports limited options. Alternatively it may launch external password-less SSH command, which supports additional options, but is generally less efficient than the built-in client.
feedback.provider.sftp.paste-content-of-: Paste the contents of the known_hosts file
feedback.provider.sftp.provide-passwordl: Provide the passwordless SSH command to execute (typically 'ssh')

feedback.repository.create-repository-ne: Enter a strong password to create Kopia repository in the provided storage.
feedback.repository.eec-warning: [EXPERIMENTAL] Error correction can help protect from certain kinds of data corruption due to spontaneous bit flips in the storage media.
feedback.repository.hostname-hint: Override this when restoring a snapshot taken on another machine
feedback.repository.provider-selection-h: To connect to a repository or create one, select the preferred storage type:
feedback.repository.repository-descripti: Helps to distinguish between multiple connected repositories
リポジトリの説明は必須です

feedback.snapshot.directory.browsing-not: Directory browsing is not supported in a web browser. Use Kopia UI.
feedback.snapshot.directory.restore-all-: You can mount/restore all the files and directories that you see below or restore files individually.
